item.title: Credit for GDP uptick should go to UPA Chidambaram
item.description: Taking credit for the uptick in domestic economy former finance minister P Chidambaram said on Saturday the 57 growth in the first quarter vindicates UPA governments projection that revival would take place in the beginning of 201415 as a result of measures taken in the previous fiscal
item.itunes:subtitle: Taking credit for the uptick in domestic economy former finance minister P Chidambaram said on Saturday the 57 growth in the first quarter vindicates UPA governments projection that revival would take place in the beginning of 201415 as a result of measur
item.itunes:summary: Taking credit for the uptick in domestic economy former finance minister P Chidambaram said on Saturday the 57 growth in the first quarter vindicates UPA governments projection that revival would take place in the beginning of 201415 as a result of measures taken in the previous fiscal

item.title: Noted historian Bipan Chandra dies at 86
item.description: Noted historian Bipan Chandra died on Sunday at his residence here after prolonged illness

item.title: No question of alliance with Mamata Banerjee Left
item.description: Left parties including CPIM on Friday dismissed the possibility of a tieup with TMC to counter thenbspBJP a day after Mamata Banerjee said that no one was untouchable in politics including the communists
item.itunes:subtitle: Left parties including CPIM on Friday dismissed the possibility of a tieup with TMC to counter thenbspBJP a day after Mamata Banerjee said that no one was untouchable in politics including the communists
item.itunes:summary: Left parties including CPIM on Friday dismissed the possibility of a tieup with TMC to counter thenbspBJP a day after Mamata Banerjee said that no one was untouchable in politics including the communists

item.title: ModiAbe warmth defines VaranasiKyoto bonding
item.description: Japanese PMs unprecedented gesture in travelling to Kyoto to meet Narendra Modi is being viewed as a clear signalling of the importance of the ties Kyoto Varanasi to become partner city affiliates
item.itunes:subtitle: Japanese PMs unprecedented gesture in travelling to Kyoto to meet Narendra Modi is being viewed as a clear signalling of the importance of the ties Kyoto Varanasi to become partner city affiliates
item.itunes:summary: Japanese PMs unprecedented gesture in travelling to Kyoto to meet Narendra Modi is being viewed as a clear signalling of the importance of the ties Kyoto Varanasi to become partner city affiliates

item.title: More violence in Muzaffarnagar tension prevails
item.description: Tension prevailed after four students from a community were beaten up in Jat colony sparking protests Irate protesters laid a siege at a police station demanding action against those who had beaten up the boys
item.itunes:subtitle: Tension prevailed after four students from a community were beaten up in Jat colony sparking protests Irate protesters laid a siege at a police station demanding action against those who had beaten up the boys
item.itunes:summary: Tension prevailed after four students from a community were beaten up in Jat colony sparking protests Irate protesters laid a siege at a police station demanding action against those who had beaten up the boys

item.title: BJP rubbishes Kumar Vishwas CM post claim
item.description: The BJP denied on Saturday AAP leader Kumar Vishwas claim that the saffron party had tried to lure him by offering him the post of Delhis chief minister soon after the results of general elections were announced
item.itunes:subtitle: The BJP denied on Saturday AAP leader Kumar Vishwas claim that the saffron party had tried to lure him by offering him the post of Delhis chief minister soon after the results of general elections were announced
item.itunes:summary: The BJP denied on Saturday AAP leader Kumar Vishwas claim that the saffron party had tried to lure him by offering him the post of Delhis chief minister soon after the results of general elections were announced

item.title: Armyman killed in operation against ultras near LoC
item.description: An army jawan was killed and another injured in an ongoing operation to flush out militants near Line of Controlnbspin Kalaroos sector of north Kashmirs Kupwara district
item.itunes:subtitle: An army jawan was killed and another injured in an ongoing operation to flush out militants near Line of Controlnbspin Kalaroos sector of north Kashmirs Kupwara district
item.itunes:summary: An army jawan was killed and another injured in an ongoing operation to flush out militants near Line of Controlnbspin Kalaroos sector of north Kashmirs Kupwara district

item.title: Muslim man shuns wife for attending IDay event
item.description: A Muslim schoolteacher in Bihar was forced to leave her house by her husband who felt she had violated the Shariat law by participating in a Independence Day function police said Saturday
item.itunes:subtitle: A Muslim schoolteacher in Bihar was forced to leave her house by her husband who felt she had violated the Shariat law by participating in a Independence Day function police said Saturday
item.itunes:summary: A Muslim schoolteacher in Bihar was forced to leave her house by her husband who felt she had violated the Shariat law by participating in a Independence Day function police said Saturday

item.title: Adityanath set to rake up Hindutva issues in bypolls
item.description: Adityanath has been in the thick of controversy lately after an undated video showing him saying for every Hindu girl converted 100 Muslim girls will be converted as retaliation going viral
item.itunes:subtitle: Adityanath has been in the thick of controversy lately after an undated video showing him saying for every Hindu girl converted 100 Muslim girls will be converted as retaliation going viral
item.itunes:summary: Adityanath has been in the thick of controversy lately after an undated video showing him saying for every Hindu girl converted 100 Muslim girls will be converted as retaliation going viral

item.title: Copycat NDA govt only carrying forward UPA policies Cong
item.description: Congress on Friday accused the NDA government of being a copycat and ridiculed it for engaging in hype and hoopla over the launch of the Jan Dhan Yojana on Thursday by PM Narendra Modi to provide bank accounts to the poor
item.itunes:subtitle: Congress on Friday accused the NDA government of being a copycat and ridiculed it for engaging in hype and hoopla over the launch of the Jan Dhan Yojana on Thursday by PM Narendra Modi to provide bank accounts to the poor
item.itunes:summary: Congress on Friday accused the NDA government of being a copycat and ridiculed it for engaging in hype and hoopla over the launch of the Jan Dhan Yojana on Thursday by PM Narendra Modi to provide bank accounts to the poor

item.title: Economy out of tough spot more reforms coming PM
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday said his government has within 100 days in office steered the economy out of a difficult situation and brought stability and promised to remove roadblocks to foreign investment
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday said his government has within 100 days in office steered the economy out of a difficult situation and brought stability and promised to remove roadblocks to foreign investment
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Friday said his government has within 100 days in office steered the economy out of a difficult situation and brought stability and promised to remove roadblocks to foreign investment

item.title: EC new transparency guidelines for parties
item.description: The Election Commission on Friday notified new guidelines making it mandatory for political parties to deposit their funds in banks and not to exceed ceiling limits in financial assistance for candidates to ensure transparency and accountability
item.itunes:subtitle: The Election Commission on Friday notified new guidelines making it mandatory for political parties to deposit their funds in banks and not to exceed ceiling limits in financial assistance for candidates to ensure transparency and accountability
item.itunes:summary: The Election Commission on Friday notified new guidelines making it mandatory for political parties to deposit their funds in banks and not to exceed ceiling limits in financial assistance for candidates to ensure transparency and accountability

item.title: Saradha links with Bangladeshs JamaateIslami probed
item.description: Enforcement Directorate sources say the scamtainted Saradha Group may have diverted nearly Rs 750 crore to Bangladesh and West Asia with the help of the controversial political outfit Bangladesh JamaateIslami
item.itunes:subtitle: Enforcement Directorate sources say the scamtainted Saradha Group may have diverted nearly Rs 750 crore to Bangladesh and West Asia with the help of the controversial political outfit Bangladesh JamaateIslami
item.itunes:summary: Enforcement Directorate sources say the scamtainted Saradha Group may have diverted nearly Rs 750 crore to Bangladesh and West Asia with the help of the controversial political outfit Bangladesh JamaateIslami

item.title: Tokyo calling What PM Modi Shinzo Abe have in common
item.description: When Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi meets Japanese counterpart Shinzo Abe in Kyoto on Saturday expect the chemistry to crackle and fizz Put that down to the kindred souls of Asian politics being united by their rightwing views
item.itunes:subtitle: When Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi meets Japanese counterpart Shinzo Abe in Kyoto on Saturday expect the chemistry to crackle and fizz Put that down to the kindred souls of Asian politics being united by their rightwing views
item.itunes:summary: When Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi meets Japanese counterpart Shinzo Abe in Kyoto on Saturday expect the chemistry to crackle and fizz Put that down to the kindred souls of Asian politics being united by their rightwing views

item.title: Rajasthan on alert over possible infiltration bid by Pak terrorists
item.description: The Rajasthan Anti Terrorism Squad ATS has sounded an alert across the state over a possible infiltration attempt by 15 Pakistanbased terrorists trained in making suicide jackets and improvised explosive devices mounted on vehicles
item.itunes:subtitle: The Rajasthan Anti Terrorism Squad ATS has sounded an alert across the state over a possible infiltration attempt by 15 Pakistanbased terrorists trained in making suicide jackets and improvised explosive devices mounted on vehicles
item.itunes:summary: The Rajasthan Anti Terrorism Squad ATS has sounded an alert across the state over a possible infiltration attempt by 15 Pakistanbased terrorists trained in making suicide jackets and improvised explosive devices mounted on vehicles
